job_title: Payment solution architect or payment Software Engineer
jd: From: vaishnavi, Xforia vaishnavi.d@xforia.com Reply to: vaishnavi.d@xforia.com Job Description :Setting up this call to discuss a new contractor search for a Software Engineer. Below is the job description for you to review prior to this call to be prepared to ask any questions you may have. Job Description:Payments Domain Expertise: Candidate must possess payments domain, development expertiseDesign & Development: Lead the design, development, and implementation of a Java based issuer processor platform, ensuring they are robust, scalable, and secure. Develop network interfaces that handle ISO standard messages, ensuring compliance with industry standards and protocols.ISO Standards: Implement systems that process ISO 8583 standard messages, ensuring accurate and efficient transaction processing.System Architecture: Contribute to the architectural decisions and design of the issuer processor platform, ensuring the system can handle high transaction volumes and low-latency processing.Code Quality: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following industry best practices and coding standards, with a focus on performance and reliability.Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams including product management, operations, and other development teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet business and regulatory requirements.Additional Skills:ISO 8583 Message SME experience, Payments Processing, Payments Networks, Java, Springboot Frameworks
